title: Stir fried beef with curried chickpeas

ingredients.item: 250g pack essential Waitrose British Beef Steak Stir Fry

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the vegetables for 2 minutes. Add the steak and stir fry for 4-5 minutes.
Stir in the chickpeas and 100ml water and cook for 1-2 minutes then sprinkle in the coriander and serve.
